Game.Name: Rockman EXE 4 - Tournament Blue Moon (Japan)
Game.plot: The fourth installment in the Mega Man Battle Network series comes in two versions--Red Sun and Blue Moon--each with different enemies, battle chips, souls, and characters. Once again, you assume the role of Lan as he and his friend, Mega Man.exe, fight to rid the Internet of viruses and other cyberworld enemies. Unlike previous games in the series, Mega Man Battle Network 4 focuses on a tournament system where players encounter a variety of enemies that must be defeated. A new Soul Unison system lets Mega Man transform into his defeated enemies.Cheat: NeoVariableSword codes1.Select a NeoVariableSword in the custom menu2.Press "OK"3.Hold "A" when that chip appears and quickly input one of the codes below:Cheat: NeoVariableSword codesOnce you get the VarSword chip you can use "secret swords attacks" in every battle you want . This will reset the game's random seed, which also resets when your next random encounter will be. Now you can go through the entire 'Net without running into a single fight, or resetting your system because you got into a fight!Cheat: Avoid Random Battles (JP Version Only)You need the Blue Moon version for this. If you play the Woodman story on a DS, you will encounter this glitch. When you jack-in to the Park Area and Woodman attacks you, go into a random battle. Run away or delete the viruses. The screen will turn white and freeze. The only way to stop this glitch is to play the Woodman story on a Gameboy Advance SP or on a regular Gameboy Advance.
